channel.title: Remove Global Object?
channel.description: Is it possible to remove lik pillars, rugs, and other objects?

item.title: Remove Global Object?
item.dc:creator: @Skw33ky Skw33ky
item.description:
@Skw33ky wrote:

[quote=“Coder Fatality, post:3, topic:288135”]it is possible…

In mine Its Deletethatobject(Xcoord, Ycoord)

To add an Object it is…

Makeglobalobject(Xcoord, Ycoord, ####, 0);

The # stands for The object Id and the 0 is for the position, 0 is north 1 is east 2 is south 3 is west!

Hoped this helped![/quote]

that all depends on the source because some are coded differently but that is the usual coding for it

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Global Object?
item.dc:creator: @Coder_Fatality Coder Fatality
item.description:
@Coder_Fatality wrote:

it is possible…

In mine Its Deletethatobject(Xcoord, Ycoord)

To add an Object it is…

Makeglobalobject(Xcoord, Ycoord, ####, 0);

The # stands for The object Id and the 0 is for the position, 0 is north 1 is east 2 is south 3 is west!

Hoped this helped!

item.title: Remove Global Object?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

This is how it’s coded in my server:

remove(ABSX, ABSY, HEIGHTLEVEL);

So, in other words, yes.

Read full topic
